title: 客户端打开工作台就会退出服务器
author: 深潭微澜
txt_content:
客户端打开原版工作台就会退出服务器，提示：a fatal error has occurred,this connection is terminated 
后台报错：[07:34:27] [Server thread/ERROR] [FML/]: Failed to save extended properties for CustomNpcsData.  This is a mod issue.
[07:34:27] [Server thread/WARN] [/]: java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: net.minecraft.server.management.ServerConfigurationManager.func_72361_f(Ljava/lang/String;)Lnet/minecraft/entity/player/EntityPlayerMP;
